basics.name: Executive Profile
basics.label: Director of Engineering
basics.summary: Proactive engineer with years of experience and management skills in Operation Management and Industrial Engineering with a passion to increase operational performance and improving customer's satisfaction. Recently achieved a Masters in Business Administration and is presently working on a Six-Sigma certification.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Management of a staff of engineers performing PRE-COST/COSTING function, conducting PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT. Developing and maintaining WORK INSTRUCTION for new & existing product.
highlights: Implemented a monitoring project reporting project comparing projected project cost to actual project cost with the purpose to provide management information concerning effect on projected margins. This resulted in margins increasing from 3% average to 18% average.
Successful developed and Implemented an inventory control software that reduced yearly expenditures by $500,000 and on hand inventory by $750,000
Reorganized finishing and distribution operation into a team/group operation, which resulted in decrease in cost by 20% -30%.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: With major responsible was establishing the bill of material structure including direct labor hour calculation from CAD drawing and motion time analysis to determine the different level of cost factors in the manufacturing process.
highlights: Experience in developing and operating systems to monitoring and establish material with usage of a MRP system.
Developed project progress reporting comparing projected project cost to actual project cost to monitor and provide management information of progress effect on project margins.
Proposed and implemented lean manufacturing techniques and continuous improvement manufacturing concepts training to improve turns and reduce manufacturing cost.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Chief Industrial Engineer/ Manager of R&D
work.summary: Project installation installation through mechanical, electrical, and OSHA related safety standards. Manage the supply chain to ensure effective and accurate operation to prevent bottlenecks and production delays.
highlights: Product Development to establish equipment requirements for new production and forecasting productive capacity of domestic and international production also including product pre-costing and load analysis.
Negotiating contractual process with suppliers on various raw material and replacement parts for domestic and international operation to ensure projects cost are controlled and maintained.
Warehouse management responsible for all function and the logistics on domestic shipping including development of a pick and pack operation for the outlet store operation.

education.studyType: Master of Business of Administration Degree
